creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: horizontal chūban; woven, simple light brown cover; vertical band of paper with inscriptions in Japanese characters on cover; accordion-style book with images on front, with blank sheets on back side; expressively rendered figures that tell the story of a woman eating an excessive amount of food and the repercussions following
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Pictures of the Presentation of the Grand Potato (O-imo kenjō zu お芋献上図)
text: Set of 12 chūban prints from the series Pictures of the Presentation of the Grand Potato (O-imo kenjō zu お芋献上図) bound in an album.
title: Album of 12 prints from the series "Pictures of the Presentation of the Grand Potato"
